casebody.data:
No. D-2550. In the Matter of Discipline of Richard Charles Bagdasarian. 562 U.S. 815, 131 S. Ct. 407,

178 L. Ed. 2d 271,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 7484. October 4, 2010.

Richard Charles Bag-dasarian, of Boca Raton, Florida, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
